text:
Created attachment 17637
adds imagelookup to the fckeditor

the files should be located as follows.
src/modules/fckeditor/usecases/insertAsset.jx
src/modules/fckeditor/usecases/fckeditor.jx
src/modules/fckeditor/java/src/org/apache/lenya/cms/editors/fckeditor/Fckeditor.java
src/modules/fckeditor/config/cocoon-xconf/usecase-insertImage.xconf
src/modules/fckeditor/config/cocoon-xconf/usecase-insertAsset.xconf

sorry, i don't know how to do this in a better way.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
agallardo@agsoftware.dnsalias.com
text:
Thanks for the patch. I don't had time to review the patch. Don't worry, keep in
mind the most important is the contribution, not how it is delivered. ;-)

Here are 3 posible options for a better contribution for the next time:

1-use eclipse to create the patch file
2-merge all the patch files
3-zip all the separated patch files.

creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
this patches are obsolet. you can check out a more recent version (with a
working linklookup) here: http://svn.wyona.com/repos/public/lenya/modules/fckeditor/

Created attachment 17646
diff btw module from trunk and module from wyona/public

I cannot save with the fck editor. However, saving with fck works fine with
Simon's module. I wasn't able to catch the differences. Here's a diff btw both
modules (trunk and Simon's). HTH, Renaud
